title: 5 reasons to visit HashiCorp at AfroTech ‘24
content:
HashiCorp is returning for its third time as an AfroTech sponsor and we can’t wait! This year, we’re located at booth #1107, and everyone is encouraged to stop by to meet our team. With nearly 200 participating companies, mapping out the week will require a strategy.

Here are five reasons why the HashiCorp booth should be on your list to visit:

1. Gain industry knowledge and insights

Meet our experts and learn firsthand insights and information on the role that HashiCorp plays in the cloud infrastructure and security industry, and how our tools are supporting companies in their journey to the cloud. Learn more about The Infrastructure Cloud and how organizations worldwide manage the full lifecycle of their infrastructure and security resources here.

2. Win certifications, swag, and more

This year, HashiCorp is excited to offer a chance to win free product certifications, which could be your ticket to advancing your career in cloud infrastructure. Learn more about our certifications here. In addition, we're raffling off exciting prizes like Apple AirPods and other tech essentials!

3. Meet our recruitment team

We’re bringing a select group of recruiters to AfroTech to connect, giving you a unique opportunity to meet directly with recruiters and hiring managers who are actively looking to fill roles across multiple teams. If you’re considering a career in cloud infrastructure and security or looking to make your next move, come chat with us.

4. Learn about our inclusive culture

Inclusivity and diversity are at the heart of HashiCorp’s culture. At AfroTech, you’ll have the chance to meet with leaders from our Employee Resource Groups (ERGs), which support and celebrate communities based on shared experiences, such as gender, ethnicity, culture, and more. Our ERG leaders will share insights on how these groups contribute to our inclusive environment, offer support, and create pathways for personal and professional growth. Find out more about our commitment to diversity in the video below:

5. Build and connect to grow your network

Take the opportunity to make in-person connections with HashiCorp recruiters and managers.

HashiCorp’s team is excited to meet, network, and exchange ideas with you! Whether it’s a quick chat about our products or a longer conversation about your career goals, we can’t wait to enjoy and share the positive energy AfroTech always brings.

Each year, we’ve had the pleasure of meeting talented individuals at AfroTech, many of whom have gone on to join HashiCorp. As you’re planning your week in Houston, make our booth a priority stop. Whether it’s for prizes, career insights, or the chance to connect with industry leaders, HashiCorp offers something for everyone. See you at booth #1107

To learn more about life at HashiCorp and career opportunities, visit hashicorp.com/careers or give us a follow on Instagram.
author: Jae Moore
